lines.text: Activate the transport. Set it for the lowest, the vilest, the most disgusting team of twisted evil enforcers Plutark ever produced.
Dismiss those small-timers from your mind.
Oh mama, the last thing I need is a sedated smart mouth.
Well, if it ain't the degenerate duo.
Let's have a looky see here. Nope, nope, nothin' nada zippo, just as white as a Osmond in a snowstorm.
Be true to your teeth or they'll be false to you.
Sorry Doc, you're going into practice, target practice.
Nap time over? It must be time to visit the little boy's room. I hope I'm not too late!
Cheap shot... but it felt good.
No, but I've seen every single episode of L.A. Law three times.
If my word was worth anything, I wouldn't be much of a villain, now would I?
